text.div:
This code system https://voicecollab.ai/fhir/CodeSystem/child-education defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
NFE No Formal EducationUser has no formal Education
PS Pre-schoolUser's highest level of education was the Pre-school level
K KindergardenUser's highest level of education was the Kindergarden level
SE Some elementary school educationUser's highest level of education was the Elementary level
G1 Grade 1User's highest level of education was Grade 1
G2 Grade 2User's highest level of education was Grade 2
G3 Grade 3User's highest level of education was Grade 3
G4 Grade 4User's highest level of education was Grade 4
G5 Grade 5User's highest level of education was Grade 5
G6 Grade 6User's highest level of education was Grade 6
G7 Grade 7User's highest level of education was Grade 7
G8 Grade 8User's highest level of education was Grade 8
G9 Grade 9User's highest level of education was Grade 9
G10 Grade 10User's highest level of education was Grade 10
G11 Grade 11User's highest level of education was Grade 11
G12 Grade 12User's highest level of education was Grade 12
